member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating if warnings should be treated as errors.

member.name: T:Cake.DocFx.Build.DocFxBuildSettings
member.summary: Contains settings used by .

member.name: P:Cake.DocFx.Build.DocFxBuildSettings.OutputPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the output folder. The default is _site, and is configured in the 'build' section of docfx.json.

member.name: P:Cake.DocFx.Build.DocFxBuildSettings.TemplateFolder
member.summary: Gets or sets the template path to use. If not specified, the default template configured in the 'build' section of docfx.json will be used.

member.name: P:Cake.DocFx.Build.DocFxBuildSettings.GlobalMetadata
member.summary: Gets global metadata. It overrides the globalMetadata settings from the config file. See for constants for metadata keys.

member.name: P:Cake.DocFx.Build.DocFxBuildSettings.Serve
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to enable previewing of the generated documentation in a built in web server.

member.name: P:Cake.DocFx.Build.DocFxBuildSettings.Force
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether all the documentation is re-build.

member.summary: Generate client-only website combining API in YAML files and conceptual files for the docfx.json file in the current working directory using the specified settings.

member.summary: Generate client-only website combining API in YAML files and conceptual files for a specific docfx.json file using the specified settings.

member.name: T:Cake.DocFx.DocFxGlobalMetadata
member.summary: Constants for metadata keys.

member.name: F:Cake.DocFx.DocFxGlobalMetadata.AppTitle
member.summary: Metadata key for setting the title. The value will be appended to each output page's head title.

member.name: F:Cake.DocFx.DocFxGlobalMetadata.AppFooter
member.summary: Metadata key for setting the footer text. If not specified DocFX's Copyright will be shown.

member.name: F:Cake.DocFx.DocFxGlobalMetadata.AppLogoPath
member.summary: Metadata key for setting the logo file's path from output root. If not specified DocFX's logo will be shown. Remember to also add file to resource.

member.name: F:Cake.DocFx.DocFxGlobalMetadata.AppFaviconPath
member.summary: Metadata key for setting the favicon file's path from output root. If not specified DocFX's favicon will be shown. Remember to add file to resource.

member.name: F:Cake.DocFx.DocFxGlobalMetadata.EnableSearch
member.summary: Metadata key for showing the search box on the top of each page.

member.name: F:Cake.DocFx.DocFxGlobalMetadata.EnableNewTab
member.summary: Metadata key for setting indicating whether to open a new tab when clicking an external link. Internal links always shows within the current tab.

member.name: F:Cake.DocFx.DocFxGlobalMetadata.DisableNavbar
member.summary: Metadata key for disabling the navigation bar on the top of each page.

member.name: F:Cake.DocFx.DocFxGlobalMetadata.DisableBreadcrumb
member.summary: Metadata key for disabling the breadcrumb on the top of each page.

member.name: F:Cake.DocFx.DocFxGlobalMetadata.DisableToc
member.summary: Metadata key for disabling table of contents on the left of each page.

member.name: F:Cake.DocFx.DocFxGlobalMetadata.DisableAffix
member.summary: Metadata key for disabling the affix bar on the right of each page.

member.name: F:Cake.DocFx.DocFxGlobalMetadata.DisableContribution
member.summary: Metadata key for disabling the "View Source" and "Improve this Doc" buttons.

member.name: F:Cake.DocFx.DocFxGlobalMetadata.GitContribute
member.summary: Metadata key for customizing the "Improve this Doc" URL button for public contributors. Use repo to specify the contribution repository URL. Use branch to specify the contribution branch. Use path to specify the folder for new overwrite files. If not set, the Git URL and branch of the current Git repository will be used.

member.name: F:Cake.DocFx.DocFxGlobalMetadata.GitUrlPattern
member.summary: Metadata key for choosing the URL pattern of the generated link for "View Source" and "Improve this Doc". Supports github and vso currently. If not set, DocFX will try speculating the pattern from domain name of the Git URL.

member.summary: Logs errors, warnings and informational messages.

member.summary: Logs errors and warnings.

member.name: F:Cake.DocFx.DocFxLogLevel.Error
member.summary: Logs only errors.

member.summary: Command line runner for the docfx metadata command.

member.name: M:Cake.DocFx.Metadata.DocFxMetadataRunner.#ctor(Cake.Core.IO.IFileSystem,Cake.Core.ICakeEnvironment,Cake.Core.IO.IProcessRunner,Cake.Core.Tooling.IToolLocator)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Cake.DocFx.Metadata.DocFxMetadataSettings
member.summary: Contains settings used by .

member.name: P:Cake.DocFx.Metadata.DocFxMetadataSettings.Projects
member.summary:
Specifies the projects to have metadata extracted. There are several approaches to extract language metadata.
From a supported project file or project file list. Supported project file extensions include .csproj, .vbproj, .sln.
From a supported source code file or source code file list. Supported source code file extensions include .cs and .vb. Files can be combined using , as seperator and search pattern.
From docfx.json file.
If the argument is not specified, docfx.exe will try reading docfx.json under current directory.

member.name: P:Cake.DocFx.Metadata.DocFxMetadataSettings.OutputPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the output folder. The default is api, and is configured in the 'metadata' section of docfx.json.

member.name: P:Cake.DocFx.Metadata.DocFxMetadataSettings.Force
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether all the documentation is re-build.
